nrqlQueries.query:
FROM DatabricksPipelineUpdate
SELECT count(*) AS 'Updates'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete' AND status = 'COMPLETED'
LIMIT MAX

FROM DatabricksPipelineUpdate
SELECT count(*) AS 'Updates'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete' AND status = 'FAILED'
LIMIT MAX

FROM DatabricksPipelineUpdate
SELECT count(*) AS 'Updates'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete' AND status = 'CANCELED'
LIMIT MAX

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace
FROM DatabricksPipelineUpdate
SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE event = 'start') AS 'Updates started', filter(count(*), WHERE event = 'complete') AS 'Updates complete'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}}
FACET workspace 
TIMESERIES
LIMIT MAX

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace
FROM DatabricksPipelineUpdate
SELECT average(duration) / 1000 AS 'Update duration'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete' 
FACET workspace
TIMESERIES
LIMIT MAX

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace,
 concat(databricksWorkspaceUrl, '/pipelines/', databricksPipelineId, '/updates/', databricksPipelineUpdateId) AS databricksPipelineUpdateUrl
SELECT count(*)
FROM (
 FROM DatabricksPipelineUpdate
 SELECT
  uniqueCount(event) as 'total',
  latest(event) as 'state'
 FACET databricksWorkspaceName, databricksWorkspaceUrl, databricksPipelineId, pipelineName, databricksPipelineUpdateId, toDatetime(creationTime, 'MMMM dd, YYYY HH:mm:ss') AS creationTime
 ORDER BY max(timestamp)
 LIMIT 100)
WHERE total = 1 AND state = 'start'
FACET workspace AS Workspace, pipelineName AS Pipeline, substring(databricksPipelineUpdateId, 0, 6) as Update, creationTime AS 'Update Creation Time', databricksPipelineUpdateUrl AS 'Databricks Link'
LIMIT 100

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace,
 substring(databricksPipelineUpdateId, 0, 6) AS update,
 concat(databricksWorkspaceUrl, '/pipelines/', databricksPipelineId, '/updates/', databricksPipelineUpdateId) AS databricksPipelineUpdateUrl
FROM DatabricksPipelineUpdate
SELECT workspace,
 databricksClusterName AS Cluster,
 pipelineName AS Pipeline,
 update,
 creationTime,
 completionTime,
 status,
 duration / 1000 AS Duration,
 databricksPipelineUpdateUrl AS 'Databricks Link'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete'
LIMIT 100

widgets.title: Average update duration by workspace and pipeline

nrqlQueries.query:
WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace
FROM DatabricksPipelineUpdate 
SELECT average(duration) / 1000 AS 'seconds'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete'
FACET workspace, pipelineName
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average update wait duration by workspace and pipeline

nrqlQueries.query:
WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace
FROM DatabricksPipelineUpdate
SELECT average(waitDuration) / 1000 AS 'seconds'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete'
FACET workspace, pipelineName
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average update run duration by workspace and pipeline

nrqlQueries.query:
WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace
FROM DatabricksPipelineUpdate 
SELECT average(runDuration) / 1000 AS 'seconds'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete'
FACET workspace, pipelineName
TIMESERIES

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace,
  concat(databricksWorkspaceUrl, '/pipelines/', databricksPipelineId, '/updates/', databricksPipelineUpdateId) AS databricksPipelineUpdateUrl
SELECT count(*)
FROM (
 FROM DatabricksPipelineFlow
 SELECT
  uniqueCount(event) as 'total',
  latest(event) as 'state'
 FACET databricksWorkspaceName, databricksWorkspaceUrl, databricksPipelineId, pipelineName, databricksPipelineUpdateId, databricksPipelineFlowName, toDatetime(queueStartTime, 'MMMM dd, YYYY HH:mm:ss') AS queueStartTime
 ORDER BY max(timestamp)
 LIMIT 100)
WHERE total = 1 AND state = 'start'
FACET workspace AS Workspace, pipelineName AS Pipeline, substring(databricksPipelineUpdateId, 0, 6) as Update, databricksPipelineFlowName AS Flow, queueStartTime AS 'Queue Start Time', databricksPipelineUpdateUrl AS 'Databricks Link'
LIMIT 100

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace,
 substring(databricksPipelineUpdateId, 0, 6) AS update,
 concat(databricksWorkspaceUrl, '/pipelines/', databricksPipelineId, '/updates/', databricksPipelineUpdateId) AS databricksPipelineUpdateUrl
FROM DatabricksPipelineFlow
SELECT workspace,
 databricksClusterName AS Cluster,
 pipelineName AS Pipeline,
 update,
 databricksPipelineFlowName AS Flow,
 queueStartTime,
 completionTime,
 status,
 duration / 1000 AS Duration,
 databricksPipelineUpdateUrl AS 'Databricks Link'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete'
LIMIT 100

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace,
 substring(databricksPipelineUpdateId, 0, 6) AS update
FROM DatabricksPipelineFlowExpectation
SELECT workspace, databricksClusterName AS cluster, pipelineName AS Pipeline, update, databricksPipelineFlowName AS Flow, name AS Expectation, dataset, passedRecordCount AS Records
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND failedRecordCount = 0
LIMIT MAX

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace,
 substring(databricksPipelineUpdateId, 0, 6) AS update
FROM DatabricksPipelineFlowExpectation
SELECT workspace, databricksClusterName AS Cluster, pipelineName AS Pipeline, update, databricksPipelineFlowName AS Flow, name AS Expectation, dataset, failedRecordCount AS Records
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksClusterName = {{cluster}} AND failedRecordCount > 0
LIMIT MAX

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace,
 substring(databricksPipelineUpdateId, 0, 6) as update,
 concat(databricksWorkspaceUrl, '/pipelines/', databricksPipelineId, '/updates/', databricksPipelineUpdateId) AS databricksPipelineUpdateUrl
FROM SparkJob
SELECT
 workspace,
 databricksclustername AS Cluster,
 sparkAppName AS 'Spark App Name',
 description AS 'Job Description',
 jobId AS 'Spark Job ID',
 duration / 1000 AS Duration,
 databricksPipelineId AS 'Pipeline ID',
 update as 'Update',
 databricksPipelineUpdateUrl AS 'Databricks Link'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksclustername = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete' AND databricksPipelineId IS NOT NULL AND databricksPipelineUpdateId IS NOT NULL
LIMIT MAX

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace,
 substring(databricksPipelineUpdateId, 0, 6) as update,
 concat(databricksWorkspaceUrl, '/pipelines/', databricksPipelineId, '/updates/', databricksPipelineUpdateId) AS databricksPipelineUpdateUrl
FROM SparkStage
SELECT
 workspace,
 databricksclustername AS Cluster,
 sparkAppName AS 'Spark App Name',
 jobDescription,
 stageId AS 'Spark Stage ID',
 duration / 1000 AS Duration,
 databricksPipelineId AS 'Pipeline ID',
 update as 'Update',
 databricksPipelineUpdateUrl AS 'Databricks Link'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksclustername = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete' AND databricksPipelineId IS NOT NULL AND databricksPipelineUpdateId IS NOT NULL
LIMIT MAX

WITH
 substring(databricksWorkspaceName, 0, position(databricksWorkspaceName, '.')) AS workspace,
 substring(databricksPipelineUpdateId, 0, 6) as update,
 concat(databricksWorkspaceUrl, '/pipelines/', databricksPipelineId, '/updates/', databricksPipelineUpdateId) AS databricksPipelineUpdateUrl
FROM SparkTask
SELECT
 workspace,
 databricksclustername AS Cluster,
 sparkAppName AS 'Spark App Name',
 jobDescription,
 taskId AS 'Spark Task ID',
 duration / 1000 AS Duration,
 databricksPipelineId AS 'Pipeline ID',
 update as 'Update',
 databricksPipelineUpdateUrl AS 'Databricks Link'
WHERE databricksWorkspaceName = {{workspace}} AND databricksclustername = {{cluster}} AND event = 'complete' AND databricksPipelineId IS NOT NULL AND databricksPipelineUpdateId IS NOT NULL
LIMIT MAX
